channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWLM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWLM

item.title: CVE-2021-41029|2024-08-04T02:59:30.978Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of input during web page generation ('cross-site scripting') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.1 and below allows attacker to store malicious javascript code in the device and trigger it via crafted HTTP requests

item.title: CVE-2021-42760|2024-08-04T03:38:50.069Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an sql command ('sql injection') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.1 and below allows attacker to disclose sensitive information from DB tables via crafted requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-42752|2024-08-04T03:38:50.217Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of input during web page generation ('cross-site scripting') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.1 and below allows attacker to execute malicious javascript code on victim's host via crafted HTTP requests

item.title: CVE-2021-36184|2024-08-04T00:54:50.127Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.1 and below allows attacker to disclosure device, users and database information via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-36185|2024-08-04T00:54:49.892Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command ('OS Command Injection') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.1 and below allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-43075|2024-08-04T03:47:13.226Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an os command ('os command injection') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.2 and below, version 8.5.2 and below, version 8.4.2 and below, version 8.3.2 and below allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via crafted HTTP requests to the alarm dashboard and controller config handlers.

item.title: CVE-2021-43070|2024-08-04T03:47:13.438Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwlm
item.description: Multiple relative path traversal vulnerabilities [CWE-23] in FortiWLM management interface 8.6.2 and below, 8.5.2 and below, 8.4.2 and below, 8.3.3 and below, 8.2.2 may allow an authenticated attacker to retrieve arbitrary files from the underlying filesystem via specially crafted web requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-43077|2024-08-04T03:47:13.236Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an sql command ('sql injection') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.2 and below, version 8.5.2 and below, version 8.4.2 and below, version 8.3.2 and below allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via crafted HTTP requests to the AP monitor handlers.
